wikipedia_page.main: Elizabeth Stirling a.k.a. Elizabeth Bridge (26 February 1819 – 25 March 1895) was an English organist and composer.

link_mentions.page: List of women composers by birth date
List of folk songs by Roud number

response: Bridge married organist and composer Elizabeth Stirling (1818–1895) on 16 May 1863 in Stepney. After she died, he married Eliza Mary Perfect Harding (1845–1910) on 2 April 1896, who served as his photographic assistant. Bridge died in Bognor after a fall while on holiday and was buried in Abney Park Cemetery.
thumb|160px|Photograph of Elizabeth Stirling by her husband F.A. Bridge
